title: Scheme Term
description: A Latimer Core term used by the CollectionDescriptionScheme and the rules relating to its application.

termName.description: The name of a class or property within the Latimer Core standard that is included in the CollectionDescriptionScheme.

mandatoryTerm.description: A flag to designate whether it's mandatory or optional for all ObjectGroups in the CollectionDescriptionScheme to include or be linked to valid data for the class or property defined in the termName property.

repeatableTerm.description: A flag to designate whether multiple instances of the Latimer Core class or property defined in the termName property may be attached to a single ObjectGroup.

identifier.description: One or more Identifiers relating to the Scheme Term

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Scheme Term
